proverbs.translation: It is when the ovation is loudest that one ought to quit the dance floor.
proverbs.wisdom: Know when to quit.

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni ọ̀rẹ́ dà kó má ṣe bínú, ẹni abínibí ńda'ni.
proverbs.translation: Those betrayed by friends shouldn't be offended, siblings betray one another.
proverbs.wisdom: Be tolerant

proverbs.proverb: Ìṣubú ẹni kì í ṣe òpin ayé ẹni.
proverbs.translation: The fall of a man is not the end of his life.
proverbs.wisdom: Failure is really a temporary set-back #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni a fẹ́ la mọ̀, a ò mọ ẹni tó fẹ́'ni.
proverbs.translation: You do know who you love; but you can't be certain of who really loves you.
proverbs.wisdom: Be perceptive.

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni òjò pa, tí àrá kó pa kó má a dúpẹ́.
proverbs.translation: Whoever got beaten by rain but wasn't struck by lightning should be thankful.
proverbs.wisdom: Be ever grateful.

proverbs.proverb: Tí ewé gbígbẹ bá bọ́ lára igi, ó ńkọ́ ewé tútù lọ́gbọ́n ni
proverbs.translation: A dry leaf that falls off a tree is a lesson to the fresh ones
proverbs.wisdom: Be perceptive

proverbs.proverb: Tí ọ̀rọ̀ bá pẹ́ á dìtàn
proverbs.translation: When an issue tarries, it will eventually become history.
proverbs.wisdom: No matter how long an issue endures, it'll one day end

proverbs.proverb: Mo yó lánàá kò kan ebi tòní.
proverbs.translation: That one was full yesterday won't stop one from being hungry today.
proverbs.wisdom: Life's needs recur daily.

proverbs.proverb: Igi ò lè gbé abẹ́ igi, kó rúwé
proverbs.translation: A tree cannot be shielded by another tree and consistently sprout leaves.
proverbs.wisdom: Get off your comfort zones.

proverbs.proverb: Agara kì í dá oníṣẹ́ Ọlọ́run.
proverbs.translation: God's messenger never grows weary.
proverbs.wisdom: God cannot be overwhelmed with man's needs

proverbs.proverb: Bó pẹ́ bó yá, ogún ọdún ńbọ̀ wá k'ọ̀la
proverbs.translation: No matter how long, twenty years time will one day be referred to as 'tomorrow'.
proverbs.wisdom: Keep hope alive

proverbs.proverb: Ọ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan là ńyọ ẹ̀gún lẹ́sẹ̀
proverbs.translation: Multiple thorns must be removed from a foot, one at a time.
proverbs.wisdom: Complex issues must be resolved one at a time

proverbs.proverb: Tí a bá fi ogún ọdún ṣánpá, ọdún wo la ó fò?
proverbs.translation: If we flap arms for twenty years, when are we going to fly?
proverbs.wisdom: Make hay while the sun shines

proverbs.proverb: Bí igi bá rorò, ó ńláti bá igbó gbé
proverbs.translation: Even if a tree is fearsome, it must still cohabit with the others in the forest.
proverbs.wisdom: Pursuing peace, is it

proverbs.proverb: Ẹyìn tí yóò di epo, yóò tọ́ iná wò.
proverbs.translation: A palm nut that would become palm oil would need to have a taste of fire.
proverbs.wisdom: No pain, no gain

proverbs.proverb: Onísùúrù ló ńfún wàrà kìnìún.
proverbs.translation: Only a patient person can get to milk a lioness.
proverbs.wisdom: Patience makes difficult tasks achievable

proverbs.proverb: Oloore l'ore ńwọ́ tọ̀.
proverbs.translation: Kindness follows the kind-hearted.
proverbs.wisdom: Kindness pays.

proverbs.proverb: Ẹní bá mọ inú rò, á mọ ọpẹ́ ẹ́ dá.
proverbs.translation: Whoever can reason well, will know how to remain ever grateful.
proverbs.wisdom: Have a heart of gratitude.

proverbs.proverb: A ò mọ iṣu tí yóò k'ẹhìn ọgbà.
proverbs.translation: No one knows the yam that will be the last in the barn.
proverbs.wisdom: No one knows tomorrow.

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tó bá fẹ́ fò gbọ́dọ̀ kọ́kọ́ sáré
proverbs.translation: Whoever wants to fly, must first run.
proverbs.wisdom: Success must be prepared for.

proverbs.proverb: A kì í dàgbà jù fún ohun tí a kò bá mọ̀.
proverbs.translation: One can't be too old (to learn)  for what one does not know.
proverbs.wisdom: There is no end to learning

proverbs.translation: If one is not (properly) seated, one shouldn't be stretching one's legs.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't be presumptuous.

proverbs.proverb: Ọgbọ́n kìí tán láyé kí a wa lọ ọ̀run
proverbs.translation: Wisdom can't be so exhausted in the world that one will go looking for it in heaven.
proverbs.wisdom: No impossibility

proverbs.proverb: Ìgbà kan ńlọ ìgbà kan ńbọ̀; ẹnìkan ò lo ilé ayé gbó
proverbs.translation: One season goes & another comes; no one can dominate forever.

proverbs.proverb: Ọgbọ́n ju agbára lọ.

proverbs.wisdom: Wisdom is crucial #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Àt'oore àt'ìkà, ìkan kì í gbé.

proverbs.translation: It's fire that man can put out, no one can put out smoke.
proverbs.wisdom: Man proposes, God disposes

proverbs.proverb: Gbogbo èèyàn oníwà tùtù kọ́ lonínúure.
proverbs.translation: It's not everyone with a quiet disposition that is kind-natured.
proverbs.wisdom: Appearance can be deceptive.

proverbs.proverb: Mímì lẹpọ̀n àgbò ńmì, kò lè já.
proverbs.translation: The ram's testicles are merely dangling, they cannot fall off.
proverbs.wisdom: Keep hope alive, though tough it may seem

proverbs.proverb: Iṣẹ́ l'oògùn ìṣẹ̀.

proverbs.wisdom: Hardwork pays

proverbs.proverb: Omi tí èyàn máa mu ò ní ṣàn kọjá rẹ̀.

proverbs.translation: It's while on the crooked tree that one will discover the proper one

proverbs.translation: What faces someone backs another, like the talking drum.

proverbs.proverb: A kì í dé ejò mọ́ fìlà ká jayé ire
proverbs.translation: One can't put on a cap with a snake in it, and be at peace.

proverbs.wisdom: Success is contagious

proverbs.proverb: Wúrà tó máa dán, á la iná kọjá
proverbs.translation: A piece of gold that wants to shine must need pass through fire
proverbs.wisdom: No pains, no gains #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ohun tí a bá bò ló ńníyì.

proverbs.proverb: Ẹda ò l'àròpin.
proverbs.translation: No one can be written off

proverbs.proverb: Bí ẹ̀mí bá wà, ìrètí ńbẹ.

proverbs.translation: We ought to focus on where we are going, not where we have fallen.

proverbs.proverb: Kò sí ohun tó le tí kì í rọ̀.
proverbs.translation: There is nothing so difficult (or hard), that it can't be resolved (or softened.
proverbs.wisdom: No irredeemable case

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni gbọ́kàn l'Ólúwa ò ní jogún òfo.
proverbs.translation: Whoever places his trust in God won't hope in vain.
proverbs.wisdom: Keep hope alive #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Tí ọ̀rọ̀ bá pẹ́, á dìtàn
proverbs.translation: When a matter tarries, it'll eventually become history
proverbs.wisdom: no matter how long an issue endures, it will one day end

proverbs.proverb: Ọ̀nà ló jìn ẹrú ní baba
proverbs.translation: The slave came from a home as well, he is simply far from it
proverbs.wisdom: The disadvantaged is human, as well

proverbs.proverb: Adùn ńbẹ lẹ́hìn ewúro.
proverbs.translation: There is sweetness in bitter-leaf, at the end.

proverbs.proverb: Irun ò ni kún kí abẹ ma lè ge.

proverbs.wisdom: Certain events are mere coincidences and not imposed.

proverbs.proverb: Èèyàn bo'ni lára ju aṣọ lọ.
proverbs.translation: Humans provide better cover than clothes.
proverbs.wisdom: Human relationships are crucial. #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ohun tí a kò jẹ lẹ́nu kì í rùn lọ́nà ọ̀fun ẹni.
proverbs.translation: What one has not eaten can't be reflecting in one's breath.
proverbs.wisdom: Effects are caused

proverbs.proverb: Ẹní bá gbé ayé jẹ́jẹ́ ni í gbé ayé pẹ́.
proverbs.translation: Whoever is patient in life is the one who lives long.
proverbs.wisdom: Patience is crucial

proverbs.proverb: Ọ̀nà kan ò w'ọjà.
proverbs.translation: It is not just one route that leads to the market.
proverbs.wisdom: Alternative approaches exist.

proverbs.proverb: Gbogbo aṣọ kọ́ là nsá lóòrùn.
proverbs.translation: It is not all clothes that one dries in the sun.
proverbs.wisdom: Different situations call for different approaches

proverbs.proverb: Bí èèyàn ò tọ̀ sójú kan, kìí hó.
proverbs.translation: If one does not urinate on a single spot, it won't foam.
proverbs.wisdom: Focused efforts strengthen the eventual result

proverbs.proverb: Òní la rí kò sẹ́ni tó mọ̀la.
proverbs.translation: It's today we see; no one knows tomorrow.
proverbs.wisdom: Man can only propose, ultimately only God disposes.

proverbs.proverb: Ọlọ́run tó ńsebẹ̀, ò kúrò ní ìdí ààrò.
proverbs.translation: God who is cooking the soup, has not left the kitchen.
proverbs.wisdom: Keep hope alive; Never give up!

proverbs.proverb: Odò tó ńṣàn kì í b'ojú w'ẹ̀hìn.
proverbs.translation: A flowing stream never looks back.
proverbs.wisdom: Be steadfast and keep moving forward #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Àkàbà tó gbé ni s'ókè le gbé'ni ṣán'lẹ̀
proverbs.translation: A ladder that takes one up can very well smash one to the ground.
proverbs.wisdom: A strength may become a weakness

proverbs.proverb: Àkàbà tó gbé ni s'ókè le gbé'ni ṣán'lẹ̀
proverbs.translation: A ladder that takes one up can very well smash one to the ground.
proverbs.wisdom: A strength may beome a weakness

proverbs.proverb: Bí ọkọ̀ kan ó re Ejìnrìn, ẹgbẹgbẹ̀rún ẹ̀ á lọ.
proverbs.translation: If one bus won't go to Ejìnrìn (a town), thousands others will go.
proverbs.wisdom: No limitations

proverbs.proverb: Aṣọ àtàtà kì í gbayì nínú àpò.
proverbs.translation: A beautiful clothe is seldom appreciated when packed up in a bag.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't keep your gifts

proverbs.proverb: Bó pẹ́ bó yá, ogún ọdún ńbọ̀ wá k'ọ̀la.
proverbs.translation: Eventually, twenty years time will soon become 'tomorrow'.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't give up; be patient.

proverbs.proverb: Ẹyẹ ò lè fi apá kan fò.
proverbs.translation: Birds can't fly with one wing.
proverbs.wisdom: We need one another #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Tí ìtàkùn bá pa ẹnu pọ̀, wọ́n a mú erin so
proverbs.translation: If creeping plants would unite, they would easily  tie up an elephant
proverbs.wisdom: Together, we can do more

proverbs.proverb: Imú kì í gbọ́ òórùn ara rẹ̀.
proverbs.translation: The nose can't perceive its own odour.
proverbs.wisdom: Objective self-appraisal can be difficult #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Imú kì í gbọ́ òórùn ara rẹ̀.
proverbs.translation: The nose can't perceive it's own odour.
proverbs.wisdom: Objective self-appraisal can be difficult #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ààtàn tí ò bá gba ẹ̀gbin, ò ní kún bọ̀rọ̀.
proverbs.translation: A dunghill that won't tolerate filth, won't be filled up easily.
proverbs.wisdom: Tolerance is crucial.

proverbs.proverb: Orúkọ rere ṣàgbà oyè
proverbs.translation: A good name is superior to titled positions (or achievements).
proverbs.wisdom: A good name shouldn't be compromised #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: A kì í bínú orí ká fi fìlà dé ìdodo.
proverbs.translation: One cannot be so angry with the head as to place the hat on the navel.

proverbs.proverb: Kí a r'odò ká sùn, kí l'ará ilé yóò mu?
proverbs.translation: If we tarry long at the river, what will those at home drink?
proverbs.wisdom: Make hay while the sun shines

proverbs.proverb: Tí ògiri ò bá lanu, aláǹgbá ò lè ráyè wọ
proverbs.translation: If there are no crevices in the wall, the lizard cannot penetrate it.
proverbs.wisdom: Effects are caused

proverbs.proverb: Kó dùn, kó pọ̀, kó pẹ́, Ọlọ́run ló ńfúnni
proverbs.translation: What's sweet, what's much & what endures, are all from God
proverbs.wisdom: Ultimately all blessings are from God

proverbs.proverb: Àwo ò mọ̀ pé òun yóò jata
proverbs.translation: The plate never knew it would (eventually) taste pepper.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't give up; the best is yet to come #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Tí agbada ò bá gbóná, àgbàdo ò lè ta.
proverbs.translation: If the frying pan is not heated up, the corns cannot pop.
proverbs.wisdom: No pain, no gain. #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Kí ìkòkò ọbẹ̀ tó lè sọ̀rọ̀ síta, ìdí ẹ̀ á gbóná
proverbs.translation: Before a pot of soup can utter any sound, it's base has to be heated up
proverbs.wisdom: No pain, no gain

proverbs.proverb: Ìṣubú ẹni kì í ṣe òpin ayé ẹni.
proverbs.translation: The fall of a man is not the end of his life.
proverbs.wisdom: Failure is temporary #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ibi tí ojú rí mọ, òun lòpin ìrìn àjò
proverbs.translation: It's how far the eyes see, that marks the end of a journey.
proverbs.wisdom: Depth of vision determines destination

proverbs.proverb: Èéfín ni ìwà; kò ṣeé fi pamọ́.
proverbs.translation: Character is like smoke; it cannot be covered up.
proverbs.wisdom: No one can feign to be what he is not for long

proverbs.proverb: Ìwà rere lẹ̀ṣọ́ ènìyàn.
proverbs.translation: Good character is what adorns a man.
proverbs.wisdom: Good character ought to be cultivated #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ìwà lọba àwúre.
proverbs.translation: Good character is superior to any goodluck charm.
proverbs.wisdom: Good character promotes

proverbs.proverb: Obìnrin tí a bá fẹ́ràn kì í ní àléébù.
proverbs.translation: A woman one loves has no blemish (or fault).
proverbs.wisdom: If it is wrong, love will not see it.

proverbs.proverb: Ẹní bá rọ'ra pa èèrà, á rí ìfun inú rẹ̀.
proverbs.translation: If one would carefully dismember an ant, one would see its intestines.
proverbs.wisdom: Patience is crucial

proverbs.proverb: Ti imú yé'mú tí imú fi ńfọn
proverbs.translation: The nose has its reasons for being noisy when blown.
proverbs.wisdom: People have their reasons; we ought to be tolerant.

proverbs.proverb: Alágbẹ̀dẹ tó nlu irin lójú kan, ó lóhun tó fẹ́ fàyọ ńbẹ̀
proverbs.translation: A blacksmith who kept hitting the iron at a spot has his reasons
proverbs.wisdom: Tolerance is it

proverbs.proverb: Owó tóbi, ṣùgbọ́n kò tó èèyàn.
proverbs.translation: Money is crucial, but it's nothing like human relationships (or networks).
proverbs.wisdom: Relationships are crucial.

proverbs.proverb: Tí a bá fi ogún ọdún ṣánpá, ọdún wo la ó fò?
proverbs.translation: If we flap arms for twenty years, when are we going to fly?
proverbs.wisdom: Make hay while the sun shines

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni ọ̀rẹ́ dà kó má ṣe bínú; ẹni abínibí ńdani
proverbs.translation: Those betrayed by friends shouldn't be offended; siblings betray one another.
proverbs.wisdom: Being tolerant

proverbs.proverb: Ẹní rí òkú ìkà nílẹ̀ tó taá níìpá, ìkà ti di méjì
proverbs.translation: Whoever kicked the corpse of a wicked fellow, made himself wicked too.
proverbs.wisdom: Forgive & forget

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tó mọ'yì obì, ló njá ewé bòó
proverbs.translation: The person who values kolanuts, is the one who'll cover them with leaves
proverbs.wisdom: We are mindful of what we value

proverbs.proverb: Ewúrẹ́ tó lè kígbe jù, kọ́ lebi ńpa jù
proverbs.translation: The goat that bleats the loudest, is not necessarily the most famished.
proverbs.wisdom: Appearance isn't reality

proverbs.proverb: A kì í dàgbà fún ohun tí a kò bá mọ̀.
proverbs.translation: One is never too old to learn what one does not know.
proverbs.wisdom: No age limit to learning #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ẹnití ò bá fẹ́ ṣe àṣedànù kò lè ṣe àṣejèrè
proverbs.translation: Those unwilling to suffer losses can't experience gains.
proverbs.wisdom: Nothing ventured, nothing gained

proverbs.proverb: Kékéré àjànàkú kì í ṣe ẹgbẹ́ ẹkùn.
proverbs.translation: A diminutive elephant is no peer to a leopard.
proverbs.wisdom: Appearance can be deceptive

proverbs.proverb: Asúramú kò tẹ́ bọ̀rọ̀ bọ̀rọ̀.
proverbs.translation: The diligent seldom gets disgraced (or falls into disrepute).
proverbs.wisdom: Diligence pays #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Àdánìkànrìn ejò ló ńjẹ ọmọ ejò níyà
proverbs.translation: It's penchant for moving alone is what exposes the snake to life-threatening risks
proverbs.wisdom: Isolation is unwise

proverbs.proverb: Ẹyẹ igbó kìí mọ fífò ọ̀dàn.
proverbs.translation: Forest birds seldom know how to fly on grasslands.
proverbs.wisdom: No one knows it all

proverbs.proverb: Ọgbọ́n ju agbára lọ.
proverbs.translation: Wisdom is better than strength.
proverbs.wisdom: Pursue wisdom #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Àlùya ni ìlù ọ̀fẹ́.
proverbs.translation: A free drum gets beaten until it's bursted.
proverbs.wisdom: What's cheap gets abused (or treated with disrespect). #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tó ńsáré tó ńwo ẹ̀hìn, ó di dandan, kó fẹsẹ̀ kọ.
proverbs.translation: Whoever keeps looking back while running, will certainly stumble.
proverbs.wisdom: Focus is crucial.

proverbs.proverb: Gbogbo ohun tó ńdán kọ́ ni wúrà.
proverbs.translation: It's not all that glitters that is gold.
proverbs.wisdom: Appearance can be deceptive #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ẹ̀rẹ̀kẹ́ lẹran dùn mọ; kò dénú
proverbs.translation: The sweetness of meat is felt within the cheeks; it doesn't get to the stomach
proverbs.wisdom: Don't focus on trivialities

proverbs.proverb: Obì tó bá fara pamọ́ ló máa ńgbo.
proverbs.translation: The kolanut fruit that hides itself is the one that grows to maturity.
proverbs.wisdom: Be modest; avoid ostentation

proverbs.proverb: Àtẹ́lẹwọ́ ẹni kìí tan nijẹ
proverbs.translation: A person's palm (result of his effort) can't deceive him
proverbs.wisdom: Don't be depedent; take responsibility for your life

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni máa jẹ oyin inú àpáta, kìí wo ẹnu àáke
proverbs.translation: Whoever wants to extract honey embedded in a mountain won't fret about the axe.
proverbs.wisdom: Be focused.

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni máa jẹ oyin inú àpáta, kìí wo ẹnu àáke
proverbs.translation: Whoever wants to extract honey embedded in a mountain won't fret about the axe.
proverbs.wisdom: Persistent!

proverbs.proverb: Tí orí kan bá sunwọ̀n á ran'gba.
proverbs.translation: If one head is blessed, it will positively impact two hundred others.
proverbs.wisdom: Success can be contagious

proverbs.proverb: A kìí gbọ́ kúkù òjò da omi agbada nù
proverbs.translation: One shouldn't pour away the water in the trough, simply because the cloud rumbles.
proverbs.wisdom: Being presumptuous

proverbs.proverb: Tí igi bá ré lugi tòkè rẹ̀ là ńkọ́kọ́ gbé
proverbs.translation: If trees fall in a pile, the top ones are removed first
proverbs.wisdom: Clear simple issues before complex ones

proverbs.proverb: A kì í fi ọjọ́ kan bọ́ ọmọ tó rù.
proverbs.translation: A lean child cannot be fattened in just one day.
proverbs.wisdom: Good things take time; patience is crucial

proverbs.proverb: Ẹní bá mọ inú rò, á mọ ọpẹ́ dá.
proverbs.translation: Whoever can reason well, will understand why he ought to be thankful.
proverbs.wisdom: To have a heart of gratitude.

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tí a ńbá nájà la ńwò a kìí wo ariwo ọjà
proverbs.translation: One should focus on one's trading partner & not on the din & bustle of the market
proverbs.wisdom: Be focused

proverbs.proverb: Bí omi bá ńbẹ lẹ́hín ẹja àrọ̀, á jayé pẹ́.
proverbs.translation: If water continues to back the cat fish, it will live long.
proverbs.wisdom: Good support (or network) matters

proverbs.proverb: Kọ̀lọ̀kọ̀lọ̀ tó bá ńsùn, ò lè rí ogbe àkùkọ jájẹ
proverbs.translation: A fox that sleeps won't get to eat a cock's comb.
proverbs.wisdom: Effort precedes results

proverbs.proverb: Èyàn kì í fúyẹ́ kó ní òun wúwo.
proverbs.translation: One should not be light and claim to be heavy.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't live in denial

proverbs.proverb: Kò sí ohun tó le tí kì í rọ̀
proverbs.translation: There is nothing so hard (or difficult), that it can't be softened (or resolved).
proverbs.wisdom: No irredeemable case

proverbs.proverb: Òkè lọwọ́ afunni ńgbé.
proverbs.translation: A  hand that gives is always at the top.
proverbs.wisdom: A generous person cannot depreciate #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Àbùkún layé gbà.
proverbs.translation: The world seeks those who will improve it.
proverbs.wisdom: Seek to make things

proverbs.proverb: Nínú ìkòkò dúdú ni ẹ̀kọ funfun ti ńjáde.
proverbs.translation: Out of the black pot comes the white corn meal.
proverbs.wisdom: No impossibility

proverbs.proverb: Bó bá ku ọwọ́ kan àdán, yóò fi rọ igi
proverbs.translation: Even if a bat is left with just one paw, it'll still hang on to a tree branch.
proverbs.wisdom: Dogged determination

proverbs.proverb: Ibi tí à ńlọ là ńwò, a kìí wo ibi tí a ti ṣubú
proverbs.translation: One should be focused on where one is going, not where one has fallen.
proverbs.wisdom: Dogged determination

proverbs.proverb: Lẹ́hìn òkùkù biribiri ìmọ́lẹ̀ á tàn.
proverbs.translation: After a pitch darkness, most assuredly comes the dawn.
proverbs.wisdom: Keep hope alive, don't give up.

proverbs.proverb: Rírò lọbẹ̀ gbẹ̀gìrì, táà bá ròó a máa díkókó.
proverbs.translation: The bean soup needs constant stirring, else it will form lumps.
proverbs.wisdom: Proper planning is crucial.

proverbs.proverb: Ọ̀rọ̀ tó máa sọni lẹ́nu a máa ńjìnnà síi ni.
proverbs.translation: One ought to keep away from matters that are potentially embarrassing
proverbs.wisdom: Discretion is crucial

proverbs.proverb: Ọ̀rọ̀ ìkọ̀kọ̀ ṣì ńbọ̀ ní'gbangba.
proverbs.translation: Whatever is carried out in secret will soon come out in the open.
proverbs.wisdom: Nothing can remain hidden forever

proverbs.proverb: Bí inú ṣe kéré tó, ó fi ààyè gba ọmọ.
proverbs.translation: As small as the belly is, it has room for a baby (or the foetus)
proverbs.wisdom: No impossibility.

proverbs.proverb: Igi ò lè gbé abẹ́ igi, kó rúwé
proverbs.translation: A tree cannot be shielded by another tree and consistently sprout leaves.
proverbs.wisdom: Get off the comfort zone.

proverbs.proverb: Ọwọ́ ọlọ́wọ́ ò lè yó ẹnu ẹlẹ́nu.
proverbs.translation: One cannot be fed to satisfaction  with the hands of another.
proverbs.wisdom: Take responsibility for your life.

proverbs.proverb: Onísùúrù ló ńfún wàrà kìnìún.
proverbs.translation: Only a patient person can get to milk a lioness.
proverbs.wisdom: Patience makes difficult tasks achievable

proverbs.proverb: Ọkàn ríran ju ojú lọ.
proverbs.translation: The heart can see farther than the eyes.
proverbs.wisdom: The heart can often see beyond the obvious #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Omi adágún a b'èérí lójú, èyí tó ńlọ tó nbọ ló ńmo
proverbs.translation: Stagnant water is replete with dirt; the flowing stream remains clean.
proverbs.wisdom: Keep moving...

proverbs.proverb: Mo yó lánàá kò kan ebi t'òní.
proverbs.translation: That one was full yesterday won't stop one from being hungry today.
proverbs.wisdom: Life's needs recur daily.

proverbs.proverb: Obì tó bá fara pamọ́ ló máa ńgbo.
proverbs.translation: The kolanut fruit that hides itself, is the one that grows to maturity.
proverbs.wisdom: Avoid ostentation

proverbs.proverb: Ààtàn tí ò bá gba ẹ̀gbin, ò ní kún bọ̀rọ̀.
proverbs.translation: A dunghill that won't tolerate filth, won't be filled up easily.
proverbs.wisdom: Being tolerant...

proverbs.proverb: A kìí ní òtítọ́ nínú ká gb'àwìn ìkà s’ọ́rùn.
proverbs.translation: We ought not to know the truth, yet take delight in wrongdoing.
proverbs.wisdom: Personal integrity is crucial

proverbs.proverb: A kìí kóòríra ọ̀fọ́ọ̀n kí a fi'ná bọ ahéré
proverbs.translation: One can't so detest the mouse as to set the farm-house on fire.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't overreact; be temperate

proverbs.proverb: Àfòmọ́ ńṣe ara ẹ̀, ó l'òún ńṣe igi
proverbs.translation: The parasitic plant hurts itself, and believes it is hurting the (host) tree.
proverbs.wisdom: Wickedness does not pay

proverbs.proverb: Bó ti wù kéèyàn lówó tó, kò lè ra ilé ayé tán
proverbs.translation: No matter how rich anyone is, no one can buy up the whole world.
proverbs.wisdom: You can pursue your dreams

proverbs.proverb: Àjẹsílẹ̀ gbèsè kì í jẹ́ kí ẹgbẹ̀fà tó ná.
proverbs.translation: A pre-existing debt makes whatever amount is on hand insufficient.
proverbs.wisdom: Decrying indebtedness...

proverbs.proverb: Agbójúlógún fi ara ẹ̀ fún òṣì ta
proverbs.translation: Whoever trusts on hoped-for inheritance, exposes himself to poverty
proverbs.wisdom: Take responsibility for your future

proverbs.proverb: Ẹyẹ kìí dédé bà lòrùlé, ọ̀rọ̀ lẹyẹ ńgbọ́
proverbs.translation: Birds do not ordinarily perch on rooftops, they are drawn by words overheard
proverbs.wisdom: Effects are caused

proverbs.proverb: Ẹyẹ kò lè fi apá kan fò.
proverbs.translation: Birds can't fly with one wing.
proverbs.wisdom: Team-work

proverbs.proverb: Tí agbada ò bá gbóná, àgbàdo ò lè ta.
proverbs.translation: If the frying pan is not heated up, the corns cannot pop.
proverbs.wisdom: No pain, no gain; no sweat, no sweet

proverbs.proverb: Òkò tí a bá bínú jù kì í pẹyẹ
proverbs.translation: A stone thrown at a bird in anger can't kill the bird.
proverbs.wisdom: Actions taken in anger seldom achieve desired results

proverbs.proverb: Àt'oore àt'ìkà, ìkan kì í gbé.
proverbs.translation: Neither acts of kindness nor those of wickedness shall be lost.
proverbs.wisdom: We reap what we sow #yorubas

proverbs.proverb: Kò sí ohun tó n'íbẹ̀rẹ̀ tí kò ní lópin.
proverbs.translation: There is nothing with a beginning that won't have an ending.
proverbs.wisdom: Nothing lasts forever

proverbs.proverb: Ìbí ò jù'bí, bí a ti bí ẹrú la bí ọmọ.
proverbs.translation: One birth is not superior to another, as a slave is born so is a free-born.
proverbs.wisdom: Fairness is crucial

proverbs.proverb: Ìdẹra ò kan àgbà.
proverbs.translation: Comfort has nothing to do with age.
proverbs.wisdom: Peace and comfort appeal to all.

proverbs.proverb: Kó dùn, kó pọ̀, kó pẹ́, Ọlọ́run ló ńfún ni
proverbs.translation: What's sweet, what's much & what endures are all from God
proverbs.wisdom: Enduring blessing only comes from God

proverbs.proverb: Bí ẹ̀mí bá wà, ìrètí ńbẹ
proverbs.translation: As long as there is life, there is hope
proverbs.wisdom: With life, there is no impossibility; keep holding on. #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Mímì lẹpọ̀n àgbò ńmì, kò lè já.
proverbs.translation: The ram's testicles are merely dangling, they can't fall off.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't give up! #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Rírú omi òkun kò ní k'ẹ́ja má sùn, kó má han'run.
proverbs.translation: The storms of the sea won't stop the fish from sleeping and snoring.
proverbs.wisdom: Keep hope alive

proverbs.proverb: Ibi tó bá gba ọmọ ológìnní, yẹ kó lè gba ọmọ eku.
proverbs.translation: Wherever can contain a kitten should be able to contain a mouse.
proverbs.wisdom: Fairness is crucial

proverbs.proverb: Bí orí ṣe tó ló ṣe ńfọ́ olórí
proverbs.translation: As a head is in size, so it aches the owner.
proverbs.wisdom: Challenges are not unusual; everyone has it. #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: A kì í kọ́'ni ká mọ ti'nú ẹni
proverbs.translation: You can teach a person but you can't know his thoughts or decisions.
proverbs.wisdom: No one knows it all #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ìwà ni í jọ oníwà lójú.
proverbs.translation: Every man's character is good in his eyes.
proverbs.wisdom: Objective self-appraisals can be difficult

proverbs.proverb: Ilé ọba tó jó ẹwà ló bù si
proverbs.translation: A palace that got burnt will soon reflect more beauty.
proverbs.wisdom: A disappointment is quite often a blessing in disguise

proverbs.proverb: Ilẹ̀ mọ́, ọ̀lẹ pòṣé.
proverbs.translation: The day breaks and the indolent hisses.
proverbs.wisdom: Decrying laziness #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ìrèké ò ní'bùdó; ibi gbogbo ló gba alágbára
proverbs.translation: Sugarcane has no place of refuge; every situation suits a hardworker just fine.
proverbs.wisdom: Hardwork pays

proverbs.proverb: Adùn ńbẹ lẹ́hìn ewúro.
proverbs.translation: There is sweetness in bitter-leaf, at the end.
proverbs.wisdom: Keep hope alive; don't give up.

proverbs.proverb: Igi tí Ọlọ́run bá gbìn, kò sẹ́ni tó lè fàá tu
proverbs.translation: No man can uproot a tree planted by God.
proverbs.wisdom: If it is from God, it is assured

proverbs.proverb: Ìwà lọba àwúre.
proverbs.translation: Good character is superior to any goodluck charm.
proverbs.wisdom: Good character promotes #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ìbàjẹ́ ọjọ́ kan kìí tán lógún ọdún
proverbs.translation: An indiscretion of one day does not get forgotten in twenty years.
proverbs.wisdom: Maintain & guard a good reputation

proverbs.proverb: Epo bíntín ló ńba ojú omi jẹ́
proverbs.translation: It's a little quantity of oil that mars the surface of water.
proverbs.wisdom: A little indiscretion mars a good reputation

proverbs.proverb: Sùúrù la fi ńyọ òróǹró kúrò lára ẹran
proverbs.translation: It's with patience that gallbladder is severed from the meat parts
proverbs.wisdom: Patience resolves complex issues

proverbs.proverb: Bí ọkọ̀ kan ó re Ejínrín, ẹgbẹgbẹ̀rún ẹ̀ á lọ
proverbs.translation: If one bus won't go to Ejinrin, thousands others will.
proverbs.wisdom: Alternative courses of action exist

proverbs.proverb: Ẹ̀sọ̀ ẹ̀sọ̀ lejò fi ńgun àgbọn.
proverbs.translation: It's with patience that snakes climb coconut palms.
proverbs.wisdom: Be patient, but determined #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Tí ayé bá wà lẹyìn aáyán, yóò pa adìyẹ.
proverbs.translation: If the world backs the cockroach, it will kill the hen.
proverbs.wisdom: Good backing often makes the difference

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tí ò rí nǹkan wò, ló ńwo ti ẹniẹlẹ́ni
proverbs.translation: It's a person with no issue to attend to, that meddles in those of others
proverbs.wisdom: Focus, focus & focus

proverbs.proverb: Bó pẹ́ bó yá, agogo tó lu méjìlá, ńbọ̀ wá lù'kan.
proverbs.translation: Eventually, a clock that struck 12 O'clock would strike 1 O'clock.
proverbs.wisdom: Keep hope alive

proverbs.proverb: Àgbàdo inú ìgò, ó di àwòmọ́jú fún adìyẹ
proverbs.translation: The corns in a bottle get viewed with disdain by the hen.
proverbs.wisdom: What is out of reach is often despised

proverbs.proverb: Orí bíbẹ́ kọ́ ni oògùn orí fífọ́.
proverbs.translation: Decapitation is not the antidote for headache.
proverbs.wisdom: Radical courses of action require caution.

proverbs.proverb: A kò lè tìtorí pé ọ̀nà jìn kí a wà padà sẹ́yìn.
proverbs.translation: One can't abort a journey, simply because the destination is far.
proverbs.wisdom: Finishing is crucial

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni bá lé eku méjì á p'òfo.
proverbs.translation: Whoever pursues two rats simultaneously, will lose out (on both).
proverbs.wisdom: Single-minded focus is crucial.

proverbs.proverb: Okùn kì í gùn títí kó má ní ibi tí a ti fàá wá
proverbs.translation: A rope can't be so long and not have where it's pulled from.
proverbs.wisdom: No effect without a cause

proverbs.proverb: Ọmọ tó máa ga ẹsẹ̀ rẹẹ̀ á tínrín
proverbs.translation: A child that will grow tall, his legs will be slim
proverbs.wisdom: There is a price for rising #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Lẹ́yìn onísùúrù l'Ọlọ́run wà.
proverbs.translation: God backs the patient.
proverbs.wisdom: Patience pays

proverbs.proverb: Bí ojú ò bá fọ́, ẹsẹ̀ kìí ṣìnà.
proverbs.translation: If the eyes do not go blind, the legs can't miss the way.
proverbs.wisdom: Vision is crucial...

proverbs.proverb: Alágbẹ̀dẹ tó nlu irin lójú kan, ó lóhun tó fẹ́ fàyọ ńbẹ̀.
proverbs.translation: The blacksmith that kept hitting the iron at a spot has his reasons.
proverbs.wisdom: Tolerance

proverbs.proverb: Bó ti wù kí ojú kan tóbi tó, ojú méjì sàn ju ojú kan lọ
proverbs.translation: No matter how big an eye is, two eyes are better than one.
proverbs.wisdom: Team effort is superior

proverbs.proverb: Tí èyàn bá ní sùúrù, ohun tí kò tó, ṣì ńbọ̀ wá ṣẹ́kù
proverbs.translation: If one is patient, what is insufficient will soon be excessive.
proverbs.wisdom: Patience is crucial

proverbs.proverb: Tí igi bá ré lugi tòkè rẹ̀ là ńkọ́kọ́ gbé
proverbs.translation: If trees fall in a pile, the top ones are removed first
proverbs.wisdom: Clear issues, from simple to complex

proverbs.proverb: Ibi tó tọ́ lèyàn ńtọ̀ sí.
proverbs.translation: One ought to urinate in a proper place.
proverbs.wisdom: Things should be done in order

proverbs.proverb: Ìka ò dọ́gba.
proverbs.translation: All fingers are not equal.
proverbs.wisdom: We are not all equally endowed. #yorubas

proverbs.proverb: Bí ìyá ò sí, ìyà tó wo ọmọ dàgbà
proverbs.translation: Without a mother, life's challenges are well able to train a child to maturity
proverbs.wisdom: Challenges can be positive

proverbs.proverb: Agara kì í dá oníṣẹ́ Ọlọ́run.
proverbs.translation: God's messenger never grows weary.
proverbs.wisdom: God can't be overwhelmed with man's needs #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ẹ̀dá ò l'áròpin.
proverbs.translation: No one can be written off.
proverbs.wisdom: Underestimate no one #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Bí ó ti wù kí ojú ọ̀run funfun tó, sánmà dúdú yó wà
proverbs.translation: No matter how bright the sky, some dark clouds will exist.
proverbs.wisdom: Challenges aren't unusual

proverbs.proverb: Ìgbà kan ńlọ ìgbà kan ńbọ̀, ẹnìkan ò lo ilé ayé gbó
proverbs.translation: One season goes another comes, no one can dominate forever.
proverbs.wisdom: Nobody dominates forever

proverbs.proverb: Ibi àgbà bá dúró sí lọmọdé ńba
proverbs.translation: It's where an elder is that a youngster grows up to meet with him
proverbs.wisdom: Youths of today, are elders of tommorrow

proverbs.proverb: Tí a bá fi ogún ọdún ṣánpá, ọdún wo la ó fò?
proverbs.translation: If we flap arms for twenty years, when are we going to fly?
proverbs.wisdom: Make hay while the sun shines

proverbs.proverb: Ibi tí à ńlọ là ńwò, a kìí wo ibi tí a ti ṣubú
proverbs.translation: We ought to be focused on where we are going, not where we have fallen.
proverbs.wisdom: Be forward-looking

proverbs.proverb: Gbogbo èèyàn oníwà tùtù kọ́ lonínúure.
proverbs.translation: It's not everyone with quiet disposition that is kind-natured.
proverbs.wisdom: Appearance can be deceptive

proverbs.proverb: Tí ọ̀rọ̀ bá pọ̀jù ìsọkúsọ lẹ̀dá yóò máa sọ.
proverbs.translation: If a person talks too much, he will talk out of turn.
proverbs.wisdom: Moderation and tact in speech

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni sọ̀rọ̀ púpọ̀ yó ṣìsọ.
proverbs.translation: Whoever  talks too much will misspeak.
proverbs.wisdom: Moderation is crucial #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ẹnití ò bá fẹ́ ṣe àṣedànù kò lè ṣe àṣejèrè.
proverbs.translation: Those who are unwilling to suffer loss can't experience gains.
proverbs.wisdom: No pains, no gains

proverbs.proverb: Gbogbo ohun tó ńdán kọ́ ni wúrà.
proverbs.translation: Not all that glitters is gold.
proverbs.wisdom: Appearance can be deceptive #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Abẹ́rẹ́ á lọ kí ọ̀nà okùn tó dí.
proverbs.translation: The needle will go through before the path is blocked for the thread.
proverbs.wisdom: Pointed focus secures progress

proverbs.proverb: Ẹyìn tí yóò di eepo, yóò tọ́ iná wò.
proverbs.translation: A palm nut that wants to become palm oil will have a taste of fire.
proverbs.wisdom: No pain, no gain

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tó bá tọwọ́ bọ ihò akàn, yó jẹ̀bi.
proverbs.translation: Whoever dipped his hand into a crab's burrow would be at fault.
proverbs.wisdom: Avoid intolerably high risks

proverbs.proverb: A kìí wo ago aláago ṣiṣẹ́.
proverbs.translation: One ought not to carry out one's duties using someone else's time piece
proverbs.wisdom: Don't evaluate your life by another's

proverbs.proverb: Iná l'ọmọ aráyé lè pa, kò s'ẹ́ni tó lè pa èéfín.
proverbs.translation: It's fire that man can put out, no one can put out smoke.
proverbs.wisdom: Man proposes, God disposes

proverbs.proverb: Tí orí bá pẹ́ ní'lẹ̀ ó ńlá ti di ire ni.
proverbs.translation: A person who remains unengaged for long, will eventually be favoured.
proverbs.wisdom: The best is yet to come

proverbs.proverb: Àdánìkànrìn ejò ló ńjẹ ọmọ ejò níyà
proverbs.translation: The snake's penchant for moving alone is what exposes it to life-threatening risks
proverbs.wisdom: Isolation is risky

proverbs.proverb: Ìgbìyànjú la fi í mọ akínkanjú
proverbs.translation: Willingness to make the needed effort is how an exceptional (or a brave) person is known.
proverbs.wisdom: Give it a shot!

proverbs.proverb: Wúrà tó máa dán, á la iná kọjá
proverbs.translation: A piece of gold that wants to shine must need pass through fire.
proverbs.wisdom: There's always a price tag...

proverbs.proverb: Orúkọ rere sàn ju wúrà àti fàdákà lọ
proverbs.translation: A good name is better than gold and silver
proverbs.wisdom: A good name is always crucial; cultivate one & protect it

proverbs.proverb: Mímì lẹpọ̀n àgbò ńmì, kò lè já.
proverbs.translation: The ram's testicles are merely dangling, they can't fall off.
proverbs.wisdom: Never give up; though tough it may seem

proverbs.proverb: Kì í ṣe gbogbo ajá tó bá ńgbóni lọ́jà la ńdá lóhùn.
proverbs.translation: Not all dogs that bark at one in the market that one responds to.
proverbs.wisdom: Avoid distractions

proverbs.proverb: Bí ewé ṣe tóbi tó, kọ́ ló ṣe wúlò tó.
proverbs.translation: How big a leaf is, is not necessarily how useful it is.
proverbs.wisdom: Appearance quite often does not count

proverbs.proverb: Nítorí ọ̀dá la ṣe ńlóko lákùrọ̀.
proverbs.translation: It's because of the time of drought that one maintains a farm by the river bank.
proverbs.wisdom: Plan for the future

proverbs.proverb: Tí ẹja bá sùn, ẹja á fi ẹja jẹ.
proverbs.translation: If a fish sleeps, it will be eaten up by another fish.
proverbs.wisdom: Complacency can be risky #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Àìnísùúrù ìnàkí ló sọọ́ di ará inú igbó
proverbs.translation: It's the gorilla's impatience  that made it an inhabitant of the forest
proverbs.wisdom: Impatience can be costly

proverbs.proverb: Ìbínú kò da nńkan, sùúrù ni baba ìwà.
proverbs.translation: Anger yields nothing; patience is the epitome of good character.
proverbs.wisdom: Patience is superior to anger

proverbs.proverb: Ohun tí a bá bò ló ńníyì.
proverbs.translation: It's what is covered up (or not easily accessible) that gets treated with honour.
proverbs.wisdom: Familiarity breeds contempt

proverbs.proverb: Èyàn kìí mọ'yì ohun tó ní, à fi tó bá sọọ́ nù
proverbs.translation: A man seldom appreciate what he has, until he loses it
proverbs.wisdom: What's available is taken for granted

proverbs.proverb: Tí orí kan bá sunwọ̀n á ran'gba.
proverbs.translation: If one head is blessed, it positively impacts two hundred others.
proverbs.wisdom: Success can be contagious

proverbs.proverb: A jókòó a fi àpò kọ́, a dìde ọwọ́ ò tó àpò mọ́.
proverbs.translation: We sat and hung a bag; we stood up and the bag was out of reach.
proverbs.wisdom: A perplexing situation

proverbs.proverb: Ohun tí èyàn ò bá níí rà, kìí yọ owó rẹ̀
proverbs.translation: One should not be haggling the price of what one will not buy.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't start what you won't finish

proverbs.proverb: Ohun tí èyàn ò bá níí rà, kìí yọ òwo rẹ̀
proverbs.translation: One should not be haggling the price of what one will not buy.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't start what you won't finish

proverbs.proverb: Aṣíwájú àgùntàn ni í da àgùntàn nù.
proverbs.translation: It's the leading sheep that leads the others astray.
proverbs.wisdom: Importance of good leadership #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Òjò tó rọ̀ sí ewúro náà ló rọ̀ sí ìrèkè
proverbs.translation: The same rain that fell on the bitter leaf fell on the sugar cane
proverbs.wisdom: Our reactions tell of who we are

proverbs.proverb: Ìṣubú ẹni kì í ṣe òpin ayé ẹni.
proverbs.translation: The fall of a man is not the end of his life.
proverbs.wisdom: Failure is really a temporary position #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Tí àdúrà bá gbà tán, apá aládúrà ò ní ka
proverbs.translation: When a prayer is answered, the person who prayed will be overwhelmed.
proverbs.wisdom: God's response is complete

proverbs.proverb: Èyíówù áwí, t'Olúwa làṣẹ.
proverbs.translation: We may say what we please, it's God's will that will get done.
proverbs.wisdom: Man proposes, God disposes

proverbs.proverb: Kọ̀lọ̀kọ̀lọ̀ tó bá ńsùn, ò lè rí ogbe àkùkọ jájẹ
proverbs.translation: A sleeping fox can't get to eat a cock's comb.
proverbs.wisdom: Effort must precede results

proverbs.proverb: Ìrírí ayé ò ní ti'ni títí kó ti'ni pa, ọgbọ́n ló fi ńkọ́'ni
proverbs.translation: Life's challenges do not kill, they simply make one wiser.
proverbs.wisdom: Keep holding on

proverbs.proverb: Àkókò ò dúró de ẹnìkan.
proverbs.translation: Time waits for no one.
proverbs.wisdom: Promptness in taking advantage of opportunity... #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Òní la rí kò sẹ́ni tó mọ̀la.
proverbs.translation: It's the present we all know; no one knows the future.
proverbs.wisdom: Man can only propose, ultimately only God disposes.

proverbs.proverb: Bì èèwọ̀ ò bá pani a máa pọ́n ni láṣọ
proverbs.translation: If an abominable act doesn't kill, it may improverish.
proverbs.wisdom: Obedience is crucial; better safe than sorry

proverbs.proverb: Ìbàjẹ́ ọjọ́ kan kì í tán lógún ọdún.
proverbs.translation: An indiscretion of one day, does not get forgotten in twenty years.
proverbs.wisdom: Acting in wisdom is crucial.

proverbs.proverb: Ẹnu òpùrọ́ kì í ṣ'ẹ̀jẹ̀.
proverbs.translation: The mouth of a liar does not bleed.
proverbs.wisdom: Having healthy skepticism; a liar may not be easily figured out

proverbs.proverb: Yinni yinni kí ẹni ṣè'mí ì.
proverbs.translation: Praise a good person so he can do more.
proverbs.wisdom: Praise

proverbs.proverb: Ẹní gbé ọba mì kì í ní ìsinmi.
proverbs.translation: Whoever gets crowned a king can't have rest.
proverbs.wisdom: Positions of responsibilities can be challenging

proverbs.proverb: Ẹní gbé ọba mì kì í ní ìsinmi.
proverbs.translation: Whoever who gets crowned a king can't have rest.
proverbs.wisdom: Positions of responsibilities can be challenging

proverbs.proverb: Àì tètè dọ́jà ò kan ti eré.
proverbs.translation: That one is not quick to the market does not connote indolence.
proverbs.wisdom: Everyone's plans & approaches differ

proverbs.proverb: Àgbẹ̀ tí kòkó ẹ̀ẹ́ yè, layé ló mọ̀ọ́ ṣe
proverbs.translation: The farmer whose cocoa plants thrive, is the one deemed successful.
proverbs.wisdom: Results matter, focus on it.

proverbs.proverb: Nínú oore loore wà.
proverbs.translation: Kindness begets kindness.
proverbs.wisdom: We reap what we sow #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Nǹkan tí èyàn ò ní jẹ, kì í fi run imú.
proverbs.translation: One shouldn't be sniffing, what one won't eat.
proverbs.wisdom: One shouldn't start what one can't finish

proverbs.proverb: Gbólóhun kan lè ba ọ̀rọ̀ jẹ́, gbólóhùn kan náà lè tún ọ̀rọ̀ ṣe
proverbs.translation: One word can mess up a discussion, and one word can improve it.
proverbs.wisdom: Tact is it

proverbs.proverb: Ilé ò ní gba eku kó tún gba ejò
proverbs.translation: A house won't harbour rats and harbour snakes as well (snakes prey on rats).
proverbs.wisdom: Mutually-exclusive scenarios

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tó bá rin ìrìn òkété wọ́n á fi èkùrọ́ lọ̀ọ́
proverbs.translation: Whoever appears like a rat, will be offered palm kernels.
proverbs.wisdom: Appearance dictates reception

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tó láṣọ tí ò léèyàn, ìhòhò ló wà
proverbs.translation: Whoever has clothes and has no one (or lack human relationships) is naked
proverbs.wisdom: Human networks are crucial

proverbs.proverb: Ẹyẹ igbó kìí mọ fífò ọ̀dàn.
proverbs.translation: Forest birds seldom know how to fly on grasslands.
proverbs.wisdom: One can rarely be adept at what one is not familar with

proverbs.proverb: Bí èèyàn ò tọ̀ sójú kan, kìí hó.
proverbs.translation: If one does not urinate on a single spot, it won't foam.
proverbs.wisdom: Focused efforts strengthen the eventual result

proverbs.proverb: Tí ẹrú bá pẹ́ n'ílé á bú alájọbí.
proverbs.translation: If a slave dwells long with one, he will insult one's forebears.
proverbs.wisdom: Familiarity breeds contempt

proverbs.proverb: Ojú tí a fi ńríran a kì í fi tẹ ilẹ̀.
proverbs.translation: One shouldn't step on the ground with the eyes with which one sees.
proverbs.wisdom: Give honour to whom it is due

proverbs.proverb: Oko dùn ńro làgbẹ̀dẹ ṣe ńr'ọkọ́.
proverbs.translation: If farming were that easy, blacksmiths won't opt to make hoes.
proverbs.wisdom: There's often more than meets the eyes

proverbs.proverb: Bí ojú ò bá fọ́ ẹsẹ̀ kìí ṣìnà
proverbs.translation: If the eyes are not blind, the legs won't miss the way
proverbs.wisdom: Vision is critical: you can't get, what you can't see

proverbs.proverb: Òkè lọwọ́ afunni ńgbé
proverbs.translation: A  hand that gives is always at the top.
proverbs.wisdom: A generous person (or a giver) won't depreciate #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Màrìwò kì í wí fún'ra wọn tẹ́lẹ̀ tí wọ́n fi ńyọ
proverbs.translation: Palm fronds do not consult with one another in advance before sprouting.
proverbs.wisdom: Focus is critical

proverbs.proverb: Ọlọ́run tó ńsebẹ̀, ò kúrò ní ìdí ààrò.
proverbs.translation: God who is cooking the soup, has not left the kitchen.
proverbs.wisdom: Never give up! #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ebi ńpa mí ò ṣeé fi ìfé sọ
proverbs.translation: I am hungry is not to be expressed by whistling.
proverbs.wisdom: A serious matter shouldn't be taken lightly #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tó bá da omi síwájú á tẹ'lẹ tútù.
proverbs.translation: Whoever waters the ground, will be able to step on a wet ground.
proverbs.wisdom: We must sow in order to reap

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tó ńretí àti sùn akán, á pẹ́ l'èbúté.
proverbs.translation: Whoever is monitoring when the crab sleeps would be long at the river bank.
proverbs.wisdom: Needless pursuit

proverbs.proverb: Kí á rí ogun, kí á máà sá, ni iyì ọkùnrin
proverbs.translation: To face war and not flee is the honour of a man.
proverbs.wisdom: One shouldn't abdicate one's responsibilities

proverbs.proverb: Ohun tí a bá fi sílẹ̀ lẹnu ewúrẹ́ ńtó.
proverbs.translation: It's whatever is left unattended, that the goat's mouth can get to.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't neglect what's of value

proverbs.proverb: Ọpẹ́ olóore, àdáàdátán ni.
proverbs.translation: The gratitude to one's benefactor ought to know no end.
proverbs.wisdom: Having a heart of gratitude and remaining grateful

proverbs.proverb: Bí a bá ṣe'ni lóore, ọpẹ́ là ńdá.
proverbs.translation: If one has been favoured with kindness, one ought to give thanks.
proverbs.wisdom: Attitude of gratitude is comely

proverbs.proverb: Ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ là ńtẹ ẹrẹ̀; ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ là ńtẹ eruku
proverbs.translation: Muds & sands are stepped on differently
proverbs.wisdom: One size does not fit all #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ọgbọ́n àgbọ́njù ni ńpa òdù ọ̀yà.
proverbs.translation: Unbridled craftiness is what kills the grasscutter.
proverbs.wisdom: Crafty people eventually self-destruct

proverbs.proverb: Ọgbọ́n kìí tán láyé ká wa lọ ọ̀run.
proverbs.translation: Wisdom can't be so exhausted in the world that one will go for it in heaven.
proverbs.wisdom: Wisdom can be acquired.

proverbs.proverb: Ọgbọ́n ju agbára lọ.
proverbs.translation: Wisdom is better than strength.
proverbs.wisdom: Go for wisdom #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: A kìí jayé ọba kí a ṣu sára
proverbs.translation: One shouldn't enjoy the privileges of royalty & defecate on oneself
proverbs.wisdom: Priviledged positions shouldn't be abused

proverbs.proverb: T'ẹni bẹ́'gi lójù; igi á rú'wé.
proverbs.translation: The shame is on him who cuts a tree; it will sprout leaves again.
proverbs.wisdom: No one can stop what God has ordained

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tí kò bá ṣubú ò lè dìde.
proverbs.translation: A person who has not fallen can't rise.
proverbs.wisdom: Falling may well be a stepping stone. #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Iṣẹ́ kì í pani, ìṣẹ́ ló ńpànìyàn.
proverbs.translation: Work never kills anyone; it's poverty that does.
proverbs.wisdom: Hardwork pays...

proverbs.proverb: Bí a ti ńṣe níbì kan èèwọ̀ ibòmíràn ni
proverbs.translation: What's acceptable in one place is an abomination in another.
proverbs.wisdom: One man's meat, is another's poison

proverbs.proverb: Ojú ẹni máa là, á rí ìyọnu.
proverbs.translation: Whoever would be wealthy would experience challenges.
proverbs.wisdom: No pain, no gain. #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Kí ìkòkò ọbẹ̀ tó lè sọ̀rọ̀ síta, ìdí ẹ̀ á gbóná.
proverbs.translation: Before a pot of soup can 'speak out', it's base will be hot.
proverbs.wisdom: No pain, no gain!

proverbs.proverb: Ti imú yé'mú tí imú fi ńfọn
proverbs.translation: The nose has its reasons for being noisy when blown.
proverbs.wisdom: People have their reasons, give them the benefit of doubt

proverbs.proverb: Tí ọ̀rọ̀ bá pẹ́ á dìtàn
proverbs.translation: When a matter tarries, it'll eventually become history.
proverbs.wisdom: No matter how long an issue endures, it will one day end

proverbs.proverb: Adìyẹ ńlàágùn, ìyẹ́ ara ni ò jẹ́ ká mọ̀
proverbs.translation: Hens sweat; their feathers conceal it.
proverbs.wisdom: Everyone has issues; some are simply able to hide theirs

proverbs.proverb: Ohun tí a bá bò ló ńníyì.
proverbs.translation: What's covered up (or concealed) is what gets treated with respect.
proverbs.wisdom: Undue familiarity does breed contempt

proverbs.proverb: Ohun tí a fi í níyì ni a fi í tẹ́.
proverbs.translation: It is what brings honour that also brings disgrace.
proverbs.wisdom: Moderation is crucial in all things

proverbs.proverb: Kìí ṣe gbogbo ajá tó bá gbóni lọ́jà la ńdá lóhùn.
proverbs.translation: It's not all dogs that bark at one at the marketplace that one responds to.
proverbs.wisdom: Be focused

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tí a  ńbá nájà la ńwò a kìí wo ariwo ọjà
proverbs.translation: One should focus on the party one is trading with and not the noise in the market.
proverbs.wisdom: Be focused

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni òjò pa, tí àrá kó pa kó má a dúpẹ́
proverbs.translation: Whoever got beaten by rain but wasn't struck by lightning should be thankful.
proverbs.wisdom: Being ever grateful

proverbs.proverb: Kúkúǹdùkú dùn ládùnjù ó tẹ́ lọ́wọ́ oníyán
proverbs.translation: The sweet potato became too sweet & ended up useless to the pounded yam seller
proverbs.wisdom: Moderation is it

proverbs.proverb: Eṣinṣin tó ńbọ́dẹ rìn ló ǹmu ẹ̀jẹ̀ àmuyó
proverbs.translation: It's the fly that relates with a hunter that gets to drink blood, contentedly
proverbs.wisdom: Power of networking

proverbs.proverb: Ẹrú kan nií mú'ni bú igba ẹrú
proverbs.translation: It's one slave that causes two hundred others to be reproved.
proverbs.wisdom: An indiscretion by one, invariably smears all.

proverbs.proverb: Tí igi ńlá ò bá wó, ọwọ́ kìí ba ẹ̀ka ẹ̀
proverbs.translation: If a big tree is not felled, its branches can't be within reach (of being cut).
proverbs.wisdom: Effects are caused

proverbs.proverb: Tí ògiri ò bá lanu, aláǹgbá ò lè ráyè wọnú ẹ̀
proverbs.translation: If there aren't crevices in the wall, the lizard can't penetrate into it
proverbs.wisdom: Effects are caused

proverbs.proverb: Ilé l'adìyẹ kò ti níyì.
proverbs.translation: It's at home that the hen has no honour.
proverbs.wisdom: Familiarity breeds contempt  #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Tí igi bá ré lu igi t'òkè rẹ̀ là ńkọ́kọ́ gbé
proverbs.translation: If trees fall in a pile, the top ones are removed first
proverbs.wisdom: Clear issues, from simple to complex

proverbs.proverb: Tí ajá bá lẹ́ni lẹ́yìn yóò pa ọ̀bọ.
proverbs.translation: If a dog gets good backing it'll easily kill a monkey.
proverbs.wisdom: Good backing often makes the difference

proverbs.proverb: Orúkọ rere sàn ju wúrà àti fàdákà lọ.
proverbs.translation: A good name is better than gold and silver.
proverbs.wisdom: Maintain a clean reputation and guard it.

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tó pa kẹ́tẹ́kẹ́tẹ́ yóò ru ẹrù rẹ̀
proverbs.translation: Whoever kills the donkey will have to carry his load
proverbs.wisdom: An action may produce unintended consequences

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tó ńsáré tó ńwo ẹ̀hìn, ó di dandan, kó fẹsẹ̀ kọ
proverbs.translation: Whoever keeps looking back while running, will certainly stumble.
proverbs.wisdom: Avoid distractions

proverbs.proverb: Odò tó ńṣàn kìí bojú wẹ̀hìn
proverbs.translation: A flowing river never 'looks' back (or flows backward).
proverbs.wisdom: Being positive and forward-looking #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Bí ẹ̀mí bá wà, ìrètí ńbẹ.
proverbs.translation: As long as there is life, there is hope.
proverbs.wisdom: No impossibility #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Bí ẹ̀mí bá wà, ìrètí ńbẹ.
proverbs.translation: As long as their is life, there is hope.
proverbs.wisdom: No impossibility #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ẹyẹ ò lè fi apá kan fò.
proverbs.translation: Birds can't fly with one wing.
proverbs.wisdom: We need one another #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Iná orí ò ní jó ilé.
proverbs.translation: The lice on the head cannot burn down the house.
proverbs.wisdom: Appearance isn't reality; sounds like fire doesn't make it fire

proverbs.proverb: Mélòó lọ̀kánjúwà fẹ́ lá ńnú ọ̀pọ̀ iyọ̀?
proverbs.translation: How much can a greedy person lick out of a large amount of salt?
proverbs.wisdom: Greed can be needlessly wasteful

proverbs.proverb: Iṣẹ́ l'oògùn ìṣẹ́.

proverbs.proverb: Iṣẹ́ l'oògùn ìṣẹ̀.

proverbs.proverb: Èyíówù áwí, t'Olúwa làṣẹ.
proverbs.translation: We may say what we please, it's God's will that will get done.
proverbs.wisdom: Man proposes, God disposes

proverbs.proverb: Ẹní bá rọ'ra pa èèrà, á rí ìfun inú rẹ̀.

proverbs.wisdom: Not outdaring oneself

proverbs.proverb: Kíni ìwúrí àwòdì tí kò lè gbé adìyẹ?
proverbs.translation: What's exciting a hawk that can't catch hens?
proverbs.wisdom: Importance of competence... #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Báa bá dàgbà kọjá bàǹtẹ́ onírù, ọmọ ẹni là ńbọ́ọ fún
proverbs.translation: If one has outgrown the loincloth, one ought to pass it to one's child
proverbs.wisdom: Being matured

proverbs.proverb: Tí a kò bá dá òmùgọ̀ lẹ́kun, yóò sọ̀kò sẹ́kùn.
proverbs.translation: If a fool is not restrained, he will throw stones at a leopard.
proverbs.wisdom: Naivety could be risky

proverbs.proverb: Etí kan ò yẹ orí; bàtà kan ò yẹ ẹsẹ̀
proverbs.translation: A single ear doesn't suit the head; a single shoe doesn't suit the feet.
proverbs.wisdom: Some things are inappropriate

proverbs.proverb: Gbogbo ara lasẹ́ fi ńjomi.
proverbs.translation: Sieves leak water through all of their holes.
proverbs.wisdom: Being perceptive #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ewúrẹ́ tó lè kígbe jù, kọ́ lebi ńpa jù.
proverbs.translation: The goat that bleats the loudest, is not necessarily the most famished.
proverbs.wisdom: Appearance isn't reality

proverbs.proverb: Gbogbo èèyàn oníwà tùtù kọ́ lonínúure.
proverbs.translation: It's not everyone with quiet disposition that is kind natured.
proverbs.wisdom: Appearance can be deceptive

proverbs.proverb: Aṣọ ńlá kọ́ l'èyàn ńlá.
proverbs.translation: Being expensively attired does not connote wealth or importance.
proverbs.wisdom: Appearance can be deceptive #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Gbogbo ohun tó ńdán kọ́ ni wúrà.
proverbs.translation: It's not all that glitters that is gold.
proverbs.wisdom: Appearance can be deceptive #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Bí oore bá pọ̀ lápọ̀jù, ibi laráyé fi í su'ni í san
proverbs.translation: If kindness is excessive, it is reciprocated with evil.
proverbs.wisdom: Moderation is critical...

proverbs.proverb: Bí oore bá pọ̀ lápọ̀jù, ibi laráyé fi í su'ni í san.
proverbs.translation: If kindness is excessive, it is reciprocated with evil.
proverbs.wisdom: Moderation is critical...

proverbs.proverb: Kọ̀lọ̀kọ̀lọ̀ tó bá ńsùn, ò lè rí ogbe àkùkọ jájẹ.
proverbs.translation: A sleeping fox can't get to eat a cock's comb.
proverbs.wisdom: Results must be preceded by efforts

proverbs.proverb: Bó ti wù kí ojú kan tóbi tó, ojú méjì sàn ju ojú kan lọ
proverbs.translation: No matter how big an eye is, two eyes are better than one
proverbs.wisdom: Together, we can do more

proverbs.proverb: Ibi tí ojú rí mọ, òun lòpin ìrìn àjò
proverbs.translation: How far one sees, marks the end of a journey.
proverbs.wisdom: The depth of one's vision determines one's destination

proverbs.proverb: Agbójúlógún fi ara ẹ̀ fún òṣì ta.
proverbs.translation: He who trusts on hoped for inheritance, exposes himself to poverty.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't place undue hope on others

proverbs.proverb: Òní la rí kò sẹ́ni tó mọ̀la.
proverbs.translation: It is today (the present) we all see, no one knows tomorrow (the future).
proverbs.wisdom: Never write off anyone

proverbs.proverb: Ilẹ̀ àánú Olúwa kì í ṣú
proverbs.translation: God's land of mercy never grows dark.
proverbs.wisdom: God is infinitely merciful; no impossible case with Him #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ìwà ni í jọ oníwà lójú.
proverbs.translation: Every man's character is good in his eyes.
proverbs.wisdom: Unpleasant fellows seldom accept that they are #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Kò sẹ́ni tó lè dá gbọ́n odò tó ńṣàn
proverbs.translation: No one person can solely scoop out a flowing stream.
proverbs.wisdom: We need one another! #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Àgbájọ ọwọ́ la fi ńsọ̀yà
proverbs.translation: It's with a bunch of fingers that chests may be beaten (an expresssion of confidence)
proverbs.wisdom: There's safety in numbers

proverbs.proverb: Abẹ́rẹ́ á lọ kí ọ̀nà okùn tó dí.
proverbs.translation: The needle will go through before the path is blocked for the thread.
proverbs.wisdom: Sharp focus secures progress.

proverbs.proverb: Kí ìkòkò ọbẹ̀ tó lè sọ̀rọ̀ síta, ìdí ẹ̀ á gbóná.
proverbs.translation: Before a pot of soup can utter any sound, it must experience heat.
proverbs.wisdom: No pain, no gain!

proverbs.proverb: Ohun tí a kò jẹ lẹ́nu kì í rùn lọ́nà ọ̀fun ẹni
proverbs.translation: What one has not eaten can't reflect in one's breath.
proverbs.wisdom: You can't reap what you've not sown

proverbs.proverb: Ojú àpá ò lè jọ ojú ara.
proverbs.translation: A scar can't look like a normal skin.
proverbs.wisdom: A scarred situation can't be compared to a fresh and an unimpaired one

proverbs.proverb: Oúnjẹ tí àá jẹ pẹ́, a kìí bu òkèlè rẹ̀ tóbi
proverbs.translation: One shouldn't cut the morsels of the food one will eat for long too big
proverbs.wisdom: Moderation is crucial

proverbs.proverb: Orí bíbẹ́ kọ́ ni oògùn orí fífọ́
proverbs.translation: Decapitation is not the antidote for headache.
proverbs.wisdom: Moderation is critical; radical actions require caution

proverbs.proverb: Wúrà tó máa dán, á la iná kọjá.
proverbs.translation: A piece of gold that wants to shine must pass through fire.
proverbs.wisdom: Success comes at a price; it's not free.

proverbs.proverb: Bí ọkọ̀ kan ó re Ejínrín, ẹgbẹgbẹ̀rún ẹ̀ á lọ
proverbs.translation: If one bus declined going to Ejinrin town, thousands others will go
proverbs.wisdom: Alternatives exist.

proverbs.proverb: Ìbàjẹ́ ènìyàn ò lè dá'ṣẹ́ Olúwa dúró.
proverbs.translation: The wickedness of man can't stop the work (or plan) of God.
proverbs.wisdom: Keep moving, undeterred...

proverbs.proverb: Ẹ̀gàn ò ní kóyin má dùn.

proverbs.proverb: Iṣu ẹni kìí fini pe ọmọdé, kó má ta
proverbs.translation: One's yam plant can't refuse to grow well, simply because one is young.
proverbs.wisdom: Age is no barrier to success

proverbs.proverb: Bó pẹ́ bó yá, akólòlò á pe 'baba'.
proverbs.translation: No matter how long a stammerer will eventually pronounce 'baba' (or father).
proverbs.wisdom: Keeping hope alive...

proverbs.proverb: Bí a ò kú, ìṣe ò tán.
proverbs.translation: As long as there is life, there is no end to accomplishments.
proverbs.wisdom: No one can be underrated #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ìrírí ayé ò ní ti'ni títí kó ti'ni pa, ọgbọ́n ló fi ńkọ́'ni
proverbs.translation: Life's challenges do not kill;, they simply make us wiser
proverbs.wisdom: Being positive...

proverbs.proverb: Ẹyìn tí yóò di eepo, yóò tọ́ iná wò
proverbs.translation: A palm nut that wants to become palm oil will have a taste of fire
proverbs.wisdom: No pain, no gain #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Nǹkan tí èyàn ò ní jẹ, kì í fi run imú.
proverbs.translation: One shouldn't be sniffing, what one won't eat.
proverbs.wisdom: One shouldn't start what one can't finish

proverbs.proverb: Ibi tó tọ́ lèyàn ńtọ̀ sí.

proverbs.wisdom: Things should be done in order #yoruba

proverbs.translation: The person one isn't interested in, always lives too far away
proverbs.wisdom: We seek excuses for what doesn't interest us

proverbs.proverb: Àyè kìí há adìyẹ kó mà lè dé ìdí àba rẹ̀
proverbs.translation: A hen can't be so busy as to be unable to get to its eggs
proverbs.wisdom: Everyone makes time for what's crucial

proverbs.proverb: Òlẹ ṣu ó kàá kún iṣẹ́.
proverbs.translation: A lazy man defecated and takes it as work.
proverbs.wisdom: A lazy man takes simple non-productive tasks as serious work

proverbs.proverb: Àfòmọ́ ò légbò gbogbo igi nií bá tan
proverbs.translation: The parasitic plant has no root; it lives off all trees.
proverbs.wisdom: Those who sponge off others are seldom loyal

proverbs.proverb: Àdánìkànrìn ejò ló ńjẹ ọmọ ejò níyà

proverbs.wisdom: Isolation is risky

proverbs.proverb: Ìdẹra ò kan àgbà.
proverbs.translation: Comfort has nothing to do with age.
proverbs.wisdom: Peace and comfort appeal to all.

proverbs.proverb: Bí oko bá tilẹ̀ dára bí ilé, ibi kan lèyàn ńfọwọ́ mú
proverbs.translation: Even if the farm is as nice as the home, one ought to stick to one.
proverbs.wisdom: Being focused..

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni bá lé eku méjì á p'òfo.
proverbs.translation: Whoever chases two rats simultaneously, will end up catching none.
proverbs.wisdom: Being single-focused...

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni bá lé eku méjì á p'òfo.
proverbs.translation: Whoever chases two rats simultaneously, will end up catching none.
proverbs.wisdom: Being single-focused... #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ojojúmọ́ kọ́ lọbẹ̀ obìnrin máa ńdùn.
proverbs.translation: It's not everyday a woman's soup tastes delicious.
proverbs.wisdom: Being tolerant...

proverbs.proverb: Bí orí ṣe tó ló ṣe ńfọ́ olórí.
proverbs.translation: As a head is in size, so it aches its owner.
proverbs.wisdom: As a man is, so are his challenges #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Bí orí bá ti mọ, là ńdá fìlà fún un.
proverbs.translation: As a head is (in size), so caps are made for it.
proverbs.wisdom: One ought to live within one's means

proverbs.proverb: Ọmọ àìjọbẹ̀rí ló ńja epo sáyà
proverbs.translation: It's a child new to eating stews; that soils his chest with it
proverbs.wisdom: Those new to something are prone to excesses

proverbs.proverb: Bí ó bá ku ọwọ́ kan àdán, yóò fi rọ'gi
proverbs.translation: Even if a bat is left with just one paw, it'll still hang on to a tree branch

proverbs.proverb: Ilé la ńwò kí a tó sọmọ lórúkọ

proverbs.wisdom: One should not outdare himself

proverbs.proverb: Ọjọ́ ti ọmọdé nàró kọ́ ni í rìn.
proverbs.translation: It's not the day a baby stands up for the first time that he (or she) walks.
proverbs.wisdom: Being patient...

proverbs.wisdom: What's out of reach gets despised

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tó ńsáré tó ńwo ẹ̀hìn, ó di dandan, kó fẹsẹ̀ kọ.

proverbs.wisdom: Being focused...

proverbs.translation: All dogs that feed on the excrements of rats don't get filled.

proverbs.proverb: Ìgbín kì í tẹnu mọ́'gi kó má gùn ún.

proverbs.proverb: Kò sí ohun tó le tí kì í rọ̀.
proverbs.translation: There is nothing that is hard, that can't become soft.
proverbs.wisdom: No impossibility...

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni kan kì í gbọ́n tán.

proverbs.wisdom: Maintaining a teachable disposition... #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Àlùya ni ìlù ọ̀fẹ́.
proverbs.translation: A free drum gets beaten until it's bursted.
proverbs.wisdom: What's cheap gets abused or treated with dishonour. #yoruba

proverbs.translation: It's one at a time that thorns are removed from a leg.
proverbs.wisdom: Complex issues ought to be resolved one at a time

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tí ò bá ṣubú ò lè dìde.
proverbs.translation: A person who has not fallen can't be rising.
proverbs.wisdom: Falling may well be a stepping stone... #yoruba

proverbs.translation: Life is a storm, if it blows forward, it will blow backward, as well.
proverbs.wisdom: No condition is permanent

proverbs.proverb: Ẹyìn tí yóò di epo, yóò tọ́ iná wò.
proverbs.translation: A palm nut that desires to become palm oil will have a taste of fire.
proverbs.wisdom: Success comes with a price tag

proverbs.proverb: Ẹ̀dá ò l'áròpin.
proverbs.translation: No one can be written off.
proverbs.wisdom: Never underestimate anyone

proverbs.proverb: Ìṣubú ẹni kì í ṣe òpin ayé ẹni.
proverbs.translation: The fall of a man is not the end of his life.
proverbs.wisdom: Failure is a temporary position #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Wúrà tó máa dán, á la iná kọjá.
proverbs.translation: Gold must need go through fire, if it desires to shine.
proverbs.wisdom: No pains, no gains #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: À ńpe gbẹ́nàgbẹ́nà ẹyẹ àkókó ńyọ'jú
proverbs.translation: We are calling for a carpenter, and the woodpecker shows up.
proverbs.wisdom: Refers to someone who outdares himself.

proverbs.proverb: Àtùpà kì í níyì lọ́ọ̀sán.
proverbs.translation: A lamp is not valued in the afternoons
proverbs.wisdom: Solutions are most appreciated during challenging times #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Bí ọkọ̀ kan ó re Ejìnrìn, ẹgbẹgbẹ̀rún ẹ̀ á lọ.
proverbs.translation: If one bus won't go to Ejinrin (a town), thousands others will.
proverbs.wisdom: Alternatives often exist

proverbs.proverb: Okùn kì í gùn títí kó má ní ibi tí a ti fàá wá.
proverbs.translation: A rope can't be so long and not have where it's pulled from.

proverbs.proverb: Bí ojú ò bá fọ́, ẹsẹ̀ kìí ṣìnà.

proverbs.wisdom: Vision is crucial...

proverbs.proverb: Bí òfé ti ńfò la ti ńmọ̀ọ́ lákọ ẹyẹ.
proverbs.translation: It's by its prowess in flying that a parrot is adjudged a top-notch bird.
proverbs.wisdom: Passion for excellence...

proverbs.proverb: Rírí tí a rí igún la fi ńta igún lọ́fà
proverbs.translation: It's how the vulture appeared that caused arrows to be shot at it
proverbs.wisdom: Appearance influences experience

proverbs.proverb: Oko dún ùn ro, l'àgbẹ̀dẹ ṣe ńr'ọkọ́.
proverbs.translation: Farming is so nice, yet blacksmiths choose to make hoes.
proverbs.wisdom: Actions speak better and louder than words

proverbs.proverb: Ibi tí ojú rí mọ, òun lòpin ìrìn àjò
proverbs.translation: It's how far the eyes see, that marks the end of a journey.
proverbs.wisdom: Depth of vision determines destination

proverbs.proverb: Ìwà rere lẹ̀ṣọ́ ènìyàn.
proverbs.translation: Good character is what adorns a man.
proverbs.wisdom: Good character beautifies...

proverbs.proverb: Ọ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan là ńyọ ẹsẹ̀ lábàtà.
proverbs.translation: It's one at a time that legs are pulled out of mud.
proverbs.wisdom: Complex issues are resolved one at a time

proverbs.proverb: Ajá kì í rorò títí kó ṣọ́ ojú'lé méjì.
proverbs.translation: A dog can't be so vicious as to watch over two houses.
proverbs.wisdom: There is a limit to what anyone can do

proverbs.proverb: Ohun tó kọjú sẹ́nìkan, ẹ̀yìn ló kọ sẹ́lòmíràn bí ìlù gángan
proverbs.translation: What faces someone backs another, like the talking drum
proverbs.wisdom: Different strokes...

proverbs.proverb: Inúure àníjù, ìfunra àti èébú ní ńmú wá báni.
proverbs.translation: Excessive generosity does invite suspicion and derision to one.
proverbs.wisdom: Moderation is crucial...

proverbs.proverb: Àt'oore àt'ìkà, ìkan kì í gbé.
proverbs.translation: Neither acts of kindness nor those of wickedness are wasted.
proverbs.wisdom: We reap what we sow

proverbs.proverb: Ọpẹ́ olóore, àdáàdátán ni.
proverbs.translation: The gratitude to one's benefactor ought to know no end.
proverbs.wisdom: Having a heart of gratitude and remaining grateful.

proverbs.proverb: Igi kan kì í le títí kí akòko máà lè sọọ́.
proverbs.translation: A tree can't be so hard that the woodpecker won't be able to peck it.
proverbs.wisdom: No impossibility

proverbs.proverb: Ẹyẹ kò ní ìṣasùn, síbẹ̀síbẹ̀ ẹyẹ ńjẹ ẹyẹ ńmu
proverbs.translation: Birds have no cooking pots, yet they eat and drink
proverbs.wisdom: If God takes care of birds, He will, man

proverbs.proverb: Ẹrú kan nií múni búgba ẹrú
proverbs.translation: It's one slave that will cause two hundred others to be reproved
proverbs.wisdom: An indiscretion of one, invariably smears all

proverbs.proverb: Ohun tí a bá bò ló ńníyì.
proverbs.translation: It's what is covered up (or concealed) that gets treated with honour.
proverbs.wisdom: Familiarity breeds contempt

proverbs.proverb: Ológùńná kan kì í rìn létí odò.
proverbs.translation: A person with a single live coal ought not to walk by the river.
proverbs.wisdom: Being cautious...

proverbs.proverb: Ebi ńpa mí ò ṣeé fi ìfé sọ.
proverbs.translation: I am hungry is not to be expressed by whistling.
proverbs.wisdom: A serious matter shouldn't be treated with levity

proverbs.proverb: Kì í ṣe gbogbo ajá tó bá gbóni lọ́jà la ńdá lóhùn
proverbs.translation: It's not all dogs that bark at one in the market that one responds to
proverbs.wisdom: Being focused...

proverbs.proverb: Òkò tí a bá bínú jù kì í pẹyẹ

proverbs.wisdom: Greed can be choking (or stressful)

proverbs.translation: A prince does not enjoy the privileges of royalty like a slave

proverbs.wisdom: Being focused...

proverbs.proverb: Ọgbọ́n layé gbà.

proverbs.proverb: Ayé ò ṣeé dá gbé.

proverbs.wisdom: We need one another...

proverbs.proverb: Tí orí bá pẹ́ ní'lẹ̀ ó ńlá ti di ire ni

proverbs.wisdom: The best is yet to come

proverbs.proverb: Ojú tó rí ibi tí ò fọ́, ire ló ńdúró de.

proverbs.proverb: Tí orí bá pẹ́ ní'lẹ̀ ó ńlá ti di ire ni

proverbs.proverb: A kò lè tìtorí iná orí, bẹ́ orí náà sọnù.
proverbs.translation: One can't cut off the head, simply because there are lice on it.
proverbs.wisdom: Moderation is critica

proverbs.proverb: A kò lè tìtorí iná orí, bẹ́ orí náà sọnù.
proverbs.translation: One can't cut of the head, simply because there are lice on it.
proverbs.wisdom: Moderation is critical

proverbs.proverb: Àgbà kì í ṣe orò bí èwe.
proverbs.translation: Elderly persons should not behave childishly.
proverbs.wisdom: Those looked upon as elders should not exude immaturity

proverbs.proverb: Adìyẹ tí ò kú ṣì máa jẹ àgbàdo.
proverbs.translation: The hen that did not die will eventually get to eat corn.
proverbs.wisdom: Once there is life, nothing is impossible

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni bá pẹ́ nígbó á rí ìríkúùrí

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni bá ńsọ̀kò sádìyẹ igba, òkò ló máa sọ tílẹ̀ á fi ṣú.
proverbs.translation: Whoever is stoning 200 hens, will be at it until the evening.

proverbs.proverb: Àtùpà kì í níyì lọ́ọ̀sán.

proverbs.proverb: Ìwà kì í fi oníwà sílẹ̀.

proverbs.proverb: Agara kì í dá oníṣẹ́ Ọlọ́run.

proverbs.translation: A dunghill that is intolerant of filth won't be filled up easily
proverbs.wisdom: Being tolerant...

proverbs.proverb: Bó ti wù ká fa igi èsuru tó, èsuru yóò ta,
proverbs.translation: No matter how the "esuru" yam plant is pulled, it will yet grow to maturity.
proverbs.wisdom: Be determined!

proverbs.proverb: Àt'oore àt'ìkà, ìkan kì í gbé.

proverbs.proverb: A kì í láhun ká níyì.

proverbs.proverb: Òjò tó rọ̀ sí ewúro náà ló rọ̀ sí ìrèkè

proverbs.proverb: Ẹ̀sọ̀ ẹ̀sọ̀ lejò fi ńgun àgbọn.

proverbs.proverb: Ènìyàn bí àparò lọmọ aráyé ńfẹ́.
proverbs.translation: It's someone like the patridge that the world prefers.

proverbs.proverb: Tí iṣu ẹni bá ta, a ńfọwọ́ bòó jẹ ni.
proverbs.translation: If one's yam is well-formed, it should be consumed under wraps.
proverbs.wisdom: Avoid ostentation #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni máa jẹ oyin inú àpáta, kì í wo ẹnu àáke
proverbs.translation: Whoever wants to eat the honey embedded in a mountain will not fret about the axe.
proverbs.wisdom: Persist!

proverbs.proverb: Àtẹ́wọ́ la bá ilà, a kò mọ ẹni tó kọọ́
proverbs.translation: Lines were found on the palms, no one knew who made them
proverbs.wisdom: Some blessings aren't due to one's effort

proverbs.proverb: Òní la rí kò sẹ́ni tó mọ̀la.
proverbs.translation: It's today we see; no one knows tomorrow.
proverbs.wisdom: Man can only propose, ultimately only God disposes.

proverbs.proverb: Ọ̀nà ló jìn ẹrú ní baba
proverbs.translation: The slave came from a home as well, he is simply far from it
proverbs.wisdom: The disadvantaged is human, as well #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Eṣinṣin ò mọ ikú, jíjẹ ni tirẹ̀.
proverbs.translation: The fly is ignorant of deadly risks, all it desires is to eat.
proverbs.wisdom: Some offers are not as good as they seem

proverbs.proverb: Àìní ìyàwó ò ṣeé fi dákẹ́.
proverbs.translation: To have no wife is not an issue to be silent about.
proverbs.wisdom: Reflects the importance of marital union to the Yorubas

proverbs.proverb: Gbogbo ajá tó bá ńjẹ imí eku, wọn kìí yó
proverbs.translation: All dogs that feed on the excrements of rats don't get filled.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't settle for less, think big

proverbs.proverb: Nínú ìkòkò dúdú ni ẹ̀kọ funfun ti ńjáde.
proverbs.translation: Out of the black pot comes the white corn meal.
proverbs.wisdom: No impossibility #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Tí ògiri ò bá lanu, aláǹgbá ò lè ráyè wọ
proverbs.translation: If there aren't crevices in the wall, the lizard can't penetrate into it.
proverbs.wisdom: Effects follow causes

proverbs.proverb: Kárìn kápọ̀ yíyẹ ní í yẹni.
proverbs.translation: To walk as (or operate in) a team, brings honour to one.
proverbs.wisdom: There is safety in numbers #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Òṣùṣù ọwọ̀ la fi ńgbálẹ̀ tí'lẹ̀ fi ńmọ́.
proverbs.translation: It's a bunch of broomsticks that's used to sweep the floor, clean.
proverbs.wisdom: Together, more can be achieved

proverbs.proverb: Bí orí bá ti mọ, là ńdá fìlà fún un.
proverbs.translation: As a head is (in size), so caps are made for it.
proverbs.wisdom: Live withing your means #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ojojúmọ́ kọ́ lọbẹ̀ obìnrin máa ńdùn.
proverbs.translation: It's not everyday a woman's soup tastes delicious.
proverbs.wisdom: Be tolerant... #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Orí ẹni nií fini jọba, ìwà èyàn nií yọ èyàn lóyè
proverbs.translation: Fate does enthrone one a king, but it's character that dethrones.
proverbs.wisdom: Character may limit...

proverbs.proverb: Ìwà rere lẹ̀ṣọ́ ènìyàn.
proverbs.translation: Good character is what adorns a man.
proverbs.wisdom: Good character beautifies... #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni bá lé eku méjì á p'òfo.
proverbs.translation: Whoever chases two rats, will catch none (lose out on both).
proverbs.wisdom: Be single-focused #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Òkè lọwọ́ afunni ńgbé
proverbs.translation: A  hand that gives is always at the top.
proverbs.wisdom: A consistent giver can't depreciate #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Kò sí ohun tó le tí kì í rọ̀
proverbs.translation: There is nothing that is hard (or tough), that can't be softened.
proverbs.wisdom: No irredeemable case #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Igi tí Ọlọ́run bá gbìn, kò sẹ́ni tó lè fàá tu
proverbs.translation: No man can uproot a tree planted by God.
proverbs.wisdom: If it is from God, it is assured #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Bí ó bá ku ọwọ́ kan àdán, yóò fi rọ igi.
proverbs.translation: Even if a bat is left with just one paw, it will hang unto a tree branch.
proverbs.wisdom: Dogged determination

proverbs.proverb: Bí ẹkùn ò bá fẹ̀, èse là ńpèé.
proverbs.translation: If a leopard does not act mighty, it is looked at as a cat.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't self-deprecate; think big

proverbs.proverb: Bí òfé ti ńfò la ti ńmọ̀ọ́ lákọ ẹyẹ.
proverbs.translation: It's by how it flies that the parrot is known as a top-notch bird.
proverbs.wisdom: Think big; go for excellence

proverbs.proverb: Ìran kì í sú ojú
proverbs.translation: The eyes never gets bored of seeing (or watching).
proverbs.wisdom: Not difficult to persist when you do what you love #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Kò sẹ́ni tó lè fọwọ́ bo ògo òòrùn.
proverbs.translation: No one can cover up the glory of the sun with his hands.
proverbs.wisdom: Who God has blessed, no one can curse

proverbs.proverb: Èyàn kì í ṣu síbi tí yóò sùn sí.
proverbs.translation: One should not defecate upon where one is going to sleep.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't desecrate your base #yorubas

proverbs.proverb: Kúkúǹdùkú dùn ládùnjù ó tẹ́ lọ́wọ́ oníyán
proverbs.translation: The sweet potato became too sweet & ended up useless to the pounded yam seller
proverbs.wisdom: Moderation is key

proverbs.proverb: Ohun tí èyàn bá bá lọ sí ogun, lèyàn ńkọ'jú mọ.
proverbs.translation: It's what takes one to the battlefield that one ought to focus on.
proverbs.wisdom: Avoid distractions

proverbs.proverb: Kì í ṣe gbogbo ajá tó bá gbóni lọ́jà la ńdá lóhùn.
proverbs.translation: It's not all dogs that bark at one in the market that one attends to.
proverbs.wisdom: Be focused

proverbs.proverb: Amọ̀nà èṣí, kì í ṣe amọ̀nà ọdún yìí.
proverbs.translation: Whoever knew the way last year, will not necessarily know the way this year.
proverbs.wisdom: Learn constantly

proverbs.proverb: Ìgbín kì í tẹnu mọ́'gi kó má gùn ún.
proverbs.translation: A snail does not embark on climbing a tree and fail to climb it.
proverbs.wisdom: Be persistent #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Pírí l'olongo ńjí. A kìí rí olókùnrùn ẹyẹ lórí ìtẹ́
proverbs.translation: Robins wake up in a snap. You won't find a sick one lying on its nest
proverbs.wisdom: Don't be tardy

proverbs.proverb: Ilẹ̀ àánú Olúwa kì í ṣú
proverbs.translation: God's land of mercy never grows dark.
proverbs.wisdom: God is infinitely merciful; no impossible case with Him #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Bí igi bá rorò, ó níláti bá igbó gbé.
proverbs.translation: Even if a tree is vicious, it must still cohabit with the forest.
proverbs.wisdom: Pursue peace... #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tó gọ̀ ló ńra ìṣáná, ẹni to gbọ́n ló ńṣáa
proverbs.translation: An unwise person buys matches but the wise strikes them.
proverbs.wisdom: Focus on key results not activities

proverbs.proverb: Wúrà tó máa dán, á la iná kọjá.
proverbs.translation: Gold must need go through fire, if it desires to shine.
proverbs.wisdom: No pains, no gains #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Èyàn kì í fúyẹ́ kó ní òun wúwo.
proverbs.translation: One should not be light and claim to be heavy.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't live in denial #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Kọ̀lọ̀kọ̀lọ̀ tó bá ńsùn, ò lè rí ogbe àkùkọ jájẹ
proverbs.translation: A sleeping fox can't get to eat a cor k's comb.
proverbs.wisdom: Effort precedes results #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Tí ajá bá lẹ́ni lẹ́yìn yóò pa ọ̀bọ.
proverbs.translation: If a dog gets good backing it will easily kill a monkey.
proverbs.wisdom: Good backing empowers #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Orí ò ní kún kún, kí a pa ejò nínú ẹ̀
proverbs.translation: The (hair on a) head can't be so bushy that a snake would be killed in it.
proverbs.wisdom: Limits exist on issues

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tó bá fẹ́ fò gbọ́dọ̀ kọ́kọ́ sáré.
proverbs.translation: Whoever wants to fly, must first run.
proverbs.wisdom: Success needs prior preparation #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ọlọ́run tó ńsebẹ̀, ò kúrò ní ìdí ààrò.
proverbs.translation: God who is cooking the soup has not left the kitchen.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't give up! #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Rírò lọbẹ̀ gbẹ̀gìrì, táà bá ròó a máa díkókó
proverbs.translation: The bean soup needs to be well stirred, else it will form lumps
proverbs.wisdom: Proper planning is critical

proverbs.proverb: Èyàn kì í dára kó má kù síbì kan.
proverbs.translation: No one can be so good as not to have a flaw.
proverbs.wisdom: No one is perfect; be tolerant #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tó lóyin ò dùn, ara ẹ̀ ni ò yá
proverbs.translation: Whoever claims that honey is not sweet must be unwell
proverbs.wisdom: What's good is incontrovertible#yoruba

proverbs.proverb: A kì í yàgò fún ẹlẹ́ṣin àná.
proverbs.translation: No one gives way (or defer) to someone who used to own a horse
proverbs.wisdom: One's past is not as important as his future

proverbs.proverb: Ojú ẹni máa là, á rí ìyọnu.
proverbs.translation: Whoever will be wealthy will experience challenges.
proverbs.wisdom: No pains, no gains #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Ọmọ tó máa ga ẹsẹ̀ rẹẹ̀ á tínrín
proverbs.translation: A child that will grow tall, his legs will be slim
proverbs.wisdom: There is a price for rising

proverbs.proverb: Odò tó ńṣàn kì í b'ojú wẹ̀yìn.
proverbs.translation: A flowing stream never looks back (never flows backward)
proverbs.wisdom: Keep moving forward #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Díẹ̀ tó nínú nkan onínǹkan.
proverbs.translation: A little out of someone else's possession should be good enough.
proverbs.wisdom: Avoid greediness  #yoruba

proverbs.proverb: Agbójú lógún fi ara rẹ̀ fún òṣì ta.
proverbs.translation: Whoever trusts on hoped for inheritance exposes himself to poverty.
proverbs.wisdom: Don't place your hope on others

proverbs.proverb: A kìí wo ago aláago ṣiṣẹ́
proverbs.translation: One ought not to perform one's duties using someone else's time piece
proverbs.wisdom: Don't run your life by another's approach

proverbs.proverb: Ẹni tó ńkọrin tí ò dùn, ó ńfi etí ara rẹ̀ gbọ
